info.name: Tales of Symphonia Colette Tumblr Dashboard Theme
info.description: A bright, fluffy theme for your tumblr dashboard! Lots of whites and blues and some slight transparencies.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.00
Works on all pages except for search so far.
Includes highlighted hover and selection on right sidebar.
Adjusted colors in various areas - quoteblocks, right column text, links, and more
Removes ugly gradient bar underneath the right column
Assumes you have no tumblr radar, so I have no idea what that looks like.
White background of posts are very slightly transparent.
Drop me a note at tiranasgoldfish.tumblr.com if you have any problems!
